
Happens only on ppc64 and s390x which are BE.

comment_data.body: Thanks for the report. Could you retry it with the latest master? I added output to the assertions so that we can actually see what it wrong here. Interesting enough, that test has been around since 2013. Since I don't have such a system available, any debugging information that you could provide would be appreciated.

title: 2 tests fail on Big Endian on 0.27.3
